sentences.en: A predominantly liquid diet for a day or two may be helpful.
sentences.cn: 一两天里主要吃流质食物可能会有好处。

sentences.en: a well-meaning attempt to be helpful
An A to Z of careers gives helpful information about courses.
sentences.cn: 按字母顺序排列的职业大全提供了有助于课程选择的信息。

sentences.en: By helpful kindness the teacher broke down the new boy's shyness.
sentences.cn: 老师和蔼可亲的态度减轻了这个新来的孩子的羞怯.

sentences.en: Contact with other disabled yachtsmen of like mind would be helpful.
sentences.cn: 和其他志同道合的残疾人帆船运动员接触会有帮助。

sentences.en: During the war his pacifist leanings were not helpful.
sentences.cn: 战时他的和平主义思想派不上用场。

sentences.en: Exercise, fresh air, and good posture are all helpful.
sentences.cn: 锻炼、新鲜空气和好的坐立姿势都很有益。

sentences.en: Having the right equipment at hand will be enormously helpful.
sentences.cn: 手头上有合适的设备将会帮上大忙。

sentences.en: Her advice has frequently been less than wholly helpful.
sentences.cn: 她的建议往往毫无帮助。

sentences.en: It is helpful if we address a few key questions here.
sentences.cn: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

sentences.en: It was advice of a kind, but it wasn't very helpful.
sentences.cn: 这是一种建议, 但并不非常有用.

sentences.en: Our teacher gave us a lot of helpful books in maths.
sentences.cn: 我们老师给了我们许多数学上有帮助的书.

sentences.en: Swimming is helpful for bones that are porous and weak.
sentences.cn: 游泳有助于改善骨质疏松和骨骼脆弱。

sentences.en: Talking things out with someone else can be helpful.
sentences.cn: 跟别人讨论讨论把问题彻底谈开了可能会有用。

sentences.en: Thank you for your advice; it’s been very helpful.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.en: The catalog includes helpful information on the different bike models available.
sentences.cn: 目录中包括了在售的各种型号自行车的有用信息。
